## 'for' loop

```{r}
list_norm = list(
  a = rnorm(20, 3, 1),
  b = rnorm(40, 5, 3),
  c = rnorm(60, 0, .2),
  d = rnorm(50, -3, 1)
)
```

```{r}
mean_sd = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric(x)) {
    stop("input must be numeric")
  }
  
  if (length(x)<5) {
    stop("input must exceed 5 objects")
  }
  
  mean_x = mean(x)
  
  sd_x = sd(x)
  
  tibble(
    mean = mean_x,
    sd = sd_x
  )
  
}
```


### old method

```{r}
mean_sd(list_norm[[1]])
mean_sd(list_norm[[2]])
mean_sd(list_norm[[3]])
mean_sd(list_norm[[4]])
```


### new method

```{r}
output = vector("list", length = 4)

for (i in 1:4) {
  
  output[[i]] = mean_sd(list_norm[[i]])
  
}
```
